item.title: Trump announces 'framework' for a future deal on Greenland, drops NATO tariff threat
item.description: President Trump said he is standing down on his NATO tariff threat over Greenland, citing a "framework of a future deal" on the Danish territory.

item.title: DHS launches 'Operation Catch of the Day' enforcement action in Maine
item.description: The Department of Homeland Security has launched an operation targeting criminal illegal migrants in the state of Maine, according to a DHS spokespers...

item.title: DHS increasing self-deportation stipend from $1,000 to $2,600
item.description: The administration previously offered $1,000 for those who self-deported.

item.title: WATCH: Stunning view of northern lights seen from International Space Station
item.description: Cosmonaut Sergey Kud-Sverchkov shared a dazzling view of the northern lights as seen this week from the International Space Station.

item.title: WATCH: South braces for potentially major winter snow and ice storm this weekend
item.description: The South is bracing for a potentially major winter storm this weekend, impacting Texas, Oklahoma, Louisiana, Arkansas, Mississippi, Alabama and Tenne...
